qas.question: How many routes does the Metrobus have?
How many buses does the region have for public transit?
How many hospitals does the city have?
Who is responsible for public transit in the region?
Who provides service to the cities only hospital?

context: <a3_0><b4_0><b5_0><b6_0>Metrobus<a3_0/> Transit<b6_0/><b5_0/><b4_0/> is responsible for public transit in the region. Metrobus has a total of <a0_0>19<a0_0/> routes, <a1_0>53<a1_0/> buses and an annual ridership of 3,014,073. Destinations include the Avalon Mall, The Village Shopping Centre, Memorial University, Academy Canada, the College of the North Atlantic, the Marine Institute, the Confederation Building, downtown, Stavanger Drive Business Park, Kelsey Drive, Goulds, Kilbride, Shea Heights, the <a2_0>four<a2_0/> hospitals in the city as well as other important areas in St. John's and Mount Pearl.
